name: Beasts of Legend VR - Epic rollercoaster
name_original: Beasts of Legend VR - Epic rollercoaster
description:
Welcome to the fantastic world of Beasts of Legend VR!
The next generation of roller coaster for your virtual reality headset!

Beasts of Legend is not just a game, but also a series of stories, where you will meet a new legendary creature in each episode!

So, hold on to your chair and get ready for a totally new virtual reality experience: a 3D view in 360° and surround sound!

The game was inspired by the biggest blockbusters and offers you to plunge into the heart of films where you are the hero!
Discover the atmosphere of the best amusement parks right at home!

-- EPISODE 1: IN PURSUIT OF LEVIATHAN --
You are the "Guardian" of the temple, and, assisted by your ally "Orb", you go in pursuit of a fantastical creature, the "Leviathan".
The sea dragon escaped from his prison and headed straight for Midgard, the city of legend! Only you can stop him and prevent the mass destruction of the megalopolis!

Experience an epic adventure while discovering a futuristic universe, a thousand places of which you already know, and where nature and technology become one.
Let yourself be guided and simply enjoy the show, because the road to the city will be full of traps, and the Leviathan will not give up!
Total running time: 9 minutes.

-- CONTENT --
Arcade mode: Enable an intense rail shooter, where you can shoot many obstacles and enemies. Try to get the best score!
Available languages: French, English, Spanish, Japonese.

-- CHARACTERISTICS --
Works with all VR headsets.
Offers an option to watch the experience without a VR headset by activating the Classic View mode in the menu.
Original music and high quality sound.
No need for a joystick!

See you soon in more epic adventures!
